pullRequest.body:
Let `A` be a subset of the `mixedSpace K` of a number field `K`. We say that `A` is symmetric at real places if it satisfies:

`∀ x, x ∈ A ↔ (fun w ↦ |x.1 w|, x.2) ∈ A`

If `A` is measurable and symmetric at real places, we prove that
```
volume A = 2 ^ nrRealPlaces K * volume (plusPart A)
```
where `plusPart` is the subset of elements of `A` that are positive at all real places. 

This PR is part of the proof of the Analytic Class Number Formula.

---

If you are moving or deleting declarations, please include these lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Deletions:

- ...

Any other comments you want to keep out of the PR commit should go

using the following format:

```suggestion
  simpa [A] using (h ▸ Set.mem_univ _ : 1 ∈ A)
```
If you want.
Nice

```suggestion
```
This is not needed.

```suggestion
```

```suggestion
variable (A : Set (mixedSpace K)) {x : mixedSpace K}
```
And then you can remove it in various theorems.

```suggestion
    · simp_rw [hA, negAt_apply_abs_of_isReal, negAt_apply_snd]
```
Unless you have a good reason.
Without the `single pass`, it goes into an infinite recursion by rewriting using `hA` over and over
Ah, I guess I didn't notice the yellow bar didn't go away for me.

```suggestion
    MeasurableSet (negAt s '' (plusPart A)) :=
  negAt_preimage s _ ▸ (measurableSet_plusPart hm).preimage (negAt s).continuous.measurable
```
This is a relatively new feature of `▸`: it works also to replace of `rw [← ...]`

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - feat(NumberField/CanonicalEmbedding): define the `plusPart` of a set
